settings.text: One of the many things that sets Bonsai Bar apart from other inroads to becoming a bonsai master is our Tree Guarantee. Most people who try their hand at bonsai and hit some bumps in the road end up quitting! But we set you up for success with beginner-friendly tree species that can grow along with you. These tiny trees are so hardy that we guarantee you can keep yours alive, or weâ€™ll replace it. Seriously.

settings.text: Sure do! There is no warranty on them that you can void by doing something wrongâ€”we just need to take a look at the tree and talk a little bit about what led us here, so that we can make better choices in the future!

settings.title: Do I need a dead tree to make a tree-iage appointment?
settings.text: No! We actually would prefer if you made a Tree-iage Appointment earlier rather than later, so that we can try and help you out before your tree passes on.

settings.title: How do I get a new tree?
settings.text:
The first step in getting a replacement tree is to REGISTER YOUR TREE using the link on your care card when you first take the class - or as soon as you can! Then, if something is going wrong,Â  make a tree-iage appointment and talk to one of our expert teachers.

We strongly encourage you to make a Tree-aige Appointment BEFORE your tree is dead, so that we can try to course correct. But if it's just too late, make an appointment anyway, and bring your tree to tree-iage.

settings.title: Do I need to keep my tree once it's dead?
settings.text: Yes! We need to take a look at the tree in our tree-iage session, to help us talk through what we think may have happened to it. Photos donâ€™t cut it - we need the real deal, live and on camera!

settings.title: Okay, how do I get the tree?
settings.text:
Once you are approved for a replacement, youâ€™ll tell your tree-iage consultant what venue and date is convenient for you to come to one of our classes in your region - it helps to have one in mind when going in!

We ask that you allow at least one week from the date of your tree-iage session so that we have time to prepare your new tree. Please arrive 15-30 minutes before the class is scheduled to begin.

settings.title: Am I taking the class again?
settings.text: Nope! Just picking up a prepared tree and getting a few words of encouragement from our instructor.

settings.title: Do I have to make the tree?
settings.text: Nope! You will receive an already potted tree from the instructor of the class you are picking up at. They may be potting it fresh upon your arrival, so please be patient! We do the potting, but the styling and creativity? That's still all yours!

settings.title: Does this apply to a DIY kit?
settings.text: Yes! Our guarantee even applies to our DIY kit! Just register your Beginner Level tree when you get it and make a tree-iage session if something goes wrong.
